title: Cozy Single Room
room_description: Perfect for solo travelers, our cozy single room offers a comfortable bed and essential amenities.
features_paragraph: Includes free Wi-Fi, TV, and ensuite bathroom.
special_offers: 10% off for bookings of 3 nights or more.

title: Comfort Double Room
room_description: Our comfort double room is ideal for couples, featuring a spacious bed and modern amenities.
features_paragraph: Equipped with air conditioning, mini-fridge, and balcony with city view.

title: Executive Suite
room_description: Experience luxury in our executive suite, featuring a separate living area and stunning views.
features_paragraph: Spa bath, complimentary minibar, and access to exclusive lounge.

title: Presidential Suite
room_description: Indulge in luxury with our presidential suite, offering unmatched comfort and opulence.
features_paragraph: Private butler service, jacuzzi, and exclusive access to rooftop pool.

title: Family Room
room_description: Ideal for families, our spacious family room offers comfortable bedding and ample space.
features_paragraph: Interconnecting rooms available, children's play area, and complimentary cribs.

title: Luxury Loft
room_description: Experience urban chic in our luxury loft, featuring stylish decor and panoramic city views.
features_paragraph: Floor-to-ceiling windows, king-size bed, and in-room dining service.
special_offers: Complimentary bottle of champagne upon arrival.

title: Economy Room
room_description: Budget-friendly and comfortable, our economy room is perfect for the value-conscious traveler.
features_paragraph: Basic amenities included, shared bathroom facilities available.

title: Honeymoon Suite
room_description: Celebrate love in our romantic honeymoon suite, featuring a cozy fireplace and private balcony.
features_paragraph: Complimentary champagne breakfast in bed, couples spa package, and rose petal turndown service.
special_offers: Upgrade to a candlelit dinner for two for an additional $100.
